list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update primary color and sync workspace metadata
Changed the primary RGB color in styles.css from 13, 110, 253 to 26, 188, 156. Also, updated workspace.xml with new partials metadata for improved modularity and maintainability.

task.summary:
Refactor admin structure and update routes
Removed obsolete files and directories for clarity. Relocated key files to more appropriate locations within admin directory, updated route references accordingly, and improved error handling with a new abort function.

Add error page, chart demos, and routing logic
Added a 404 error page in `views/404.php`. Included chart demo scripts and an image asset. Implemented basic routing in `index.php` to handle admin, calendar, and patients routes.

Remove debugging echo statement
Removed an unnecessary debugging echo statement that printed the matched route. This change cleans up the output and avoids exposing internal information.

Refactor partials directory structure in admin views
Renamed and relocated partials specific to admin views for better organization. Adjusted requires in admin views to reflect the new paths, ensuring modularity and maintainability.

Add partials for head, nav, header, footer
Created new partials: head, nav, header, and footer in the views/partials directory. Updated homepage.php to utilize these partials, improving code modularity and maintainability.
